name: Widget World
description:
Made this little alien sound puzzler sandbox demo for the CDN 2019 Speedgame.  Eventually I hope this game becomes a larger, more polished project with an exciting story-line.  The verse I chose was Joel 2:7 ... and they each march in line, nor do they deviate from their paths.

Credits
Sound for first widget: BFXR
Made using Clickteam Fusion
